mapper.insert: INSERT INTO befounder (uuid, founder_uuid, found_location, found_time, picture, age, age_range, gender, remarks, state) VALUES (#{uuid}, #{founderUuid}, #{foundLocation}, #{foundTime}, #{picture}, #{age}, #{ageRange}, #{gender}, #{remarks}, #{state})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM befounder WHERE uuid = #{uuid} AND founder_uuid = #{founderUuid};
mapper.select: SELECT uuid, found_location, found_time, picture, age, age_range, gender, remarks FROM befounder WHERE founder_uuid = #{founderUuid};
SELECT picture, uuid FROM befounder WHERE age >= #{minAge} AND age <= #{maxAge} AND gender = #{gender};
